thread.title: Shahrukh Khan ‘shocked’ as fan paints graffiti on his bungalow’s wall
thread.title_full: Shahrukh Khan ‘shocked’ as fan paints graffiti on his bungalow’s wall | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Shahrukh Khan ‘shocked’ as fan paints graffiti on his bungalow’s wall
text:
A graffiti made by Shahrukh Khan’s mysterious fan on the wall of his bungalow, Mannat, has left the superstar shocked.
The graffiti, painted with yellow and blue, reads “love u SRK… C u on 15th” and has been signed off with a name ‘Gaurav’.
The 49-year-old Shahrukh Khan, who was out of town, expressed his displeasure over the grafitti on the wall of his Bandra house.
“You can’t leave your house for a day without someone messing with it! Shocked!” the actor wrote on his Twitter page.
Some fans are speculating the graffiti has references to Shahrukh Khan’s upcoming film “Fan” where he plays a double role, that of a superstar and an obsessed fan.
 09, 2015 1:50 am
